name: Unknown Zombie Shooter U.Z.S
description:
UZS is a 3d fps zombie shooter game . size of this game is only 36 mb.

system requirements : 

operating system = windows xp,vista,win7,win8 or win 10 (64 bit version only)

                                           32 bit version is coming soon

processor : any dual core processor or any low end processor

graphics card : graphics card is not required integrated graphics are enough .

ram : 512 mb
